https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ud0wvj5f8QoFlY9ABdxJLddBAuf.jpg Adan Kundle, CEO of a major advertising agency, is discovered unconscious in front of a wall of TVs. When he wakes in the hospital, Adan can only communicate through advertising slogans. And Now a Word from Our Sponsor
